parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Path and filename to which to save the sheet metal part in its flattened state to a DXF/DWG file

title: IPartDoc.ExportFlatPatternView
signature:
System.Boolean ExportFlatPatternView( 
   System.String
FilePath
,
   System.Int32
Options
)

parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Path and filename to which to save the sheet metal part in its flattened state to a DXF/DWG file

returns: True if the sheet metal part is enabled to be saved in its flattened state to a DXF/DWG file at the specified path and filename, false if not
remarks:
Call this method before calling
IModelDocExtension::SaveAs
.
